dct_title_s: Bacon's central London : divided into half mile squares & circles
dct_description_sm: G.W. Bacon & Co. was located at 127 Strand between 1874 and the 1890s. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: London : G.W. Bacon & Co., 127, Strand, [between 1874 and 1899]
